content: **shop special offer - 4 for 3 on all crochet & knitting patterns** click here to see all my patterns 1 just add 4 patterns to your cart before checkout »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» practice your half_double_crochet stitch with this **plain & simple shrug pattern ** this pattern is written over 2 a4 page using us terminology ** click the stitch for a how to video ** slip knot 2 chain st 3 half_double_crochet 4 full learn to crochet video series 5 **materials required** 5mm crochet hook h/8 caron simply soft - pumpkin - aran / worsted weight yarn tapestry / yarn needle plain and simple shrug crochet pattern is copyrighted to peach unicorn but permission is granted for any finished shrugs to be sold with the condition that the pattern is credited back to peach unicorn 1 http //www ravelry com/stores/peach-unicorn-designs 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=ysgaqwx0pgq 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=0mxk0waduli 4 https //www youtube com/watch v=jpaf7edlga0 5 https //www youtube com/playlist list=pl234v85fuglvzfbxbpmsszci3ons5y_i5
